notes: Primary source for bacterial media recipes. Well-structured with ingredient mappings.
Japanese BRC aggregator. Includes JCM, NBRC, and other sources. High overlap with DSMZ.
Largest cultivation dataset. 100,000+ strains with growth conditions. Free API with registration.
Standardized molar concentrations. Parsed from DSMZ PDFs. High overlap with MediaDive. Fetcher/importer implemented - needs SQL dump.
Chemically defined media. Integrated with metabolic models. Clean schema. Fetcher/importer implemented - needs data source.
Japanese culture collection. 400+ free media recipes. Requires ethical scraping.
No bulk API. Manual curation from web pages. Limited public access.
Part of TogoMedium. SPARQL endpoint available. Manual curation may be needed.
Algae-specific media. Well-structured HTML tables. Fills algae gap.

source_name: Culture Collection of Algae and Protozoa
notes: UK algae collection. Media recipes in PDF format. Requires PDF extraction.
German algae collection. 30+ media recipes. Web scraping required.
UK bacterial collection. No bulk API. Media references scattered.
Commercial collection. Limited public media data. Partnership may be required.
Metabolic pathway database. Media data available but requires subscription.
Part of BioCyc. Comprehensive metabolic data. Subscription required.
Semantic reference for culture conditions. Classes not recipes.
Culture media classification. Semantic framework for media types.
Chemical entity mappings to CHEBI. Critical for ingredient annotation.
